bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
mod_perl-2.0.10-1.fc26 fails to build in F26 because some tests fail:
# Failed test 1 in t/apache/read.t at line 52 t/apache/read.t ......................... 1..1 # Running under perl version 5.024000 for linux # Current time local: Thu Dec 22 19:11:21 2016 # Current time GMT: Thu Dec 22 19:11:21 2016 # Using Test.pm version 1.28_01 # Using Apache/Test.pm version 1.40 not ok 1 Failed 1/1 subtests
A difference between passing and failig build root is:
gcc 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 httpd 2.4.23-7.fc26 > 2.4.25-2.fc26 httpd-devel 2.4.23-7.fc26 > 2.4.25-2.fc26 libgomp 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 libselinux 2.5-13.fc26 > 2.5-14.fc26 systemtap-sdt-devel 3.1-0.20161212git... > 3.1-0.20161220git... httpd-filesystem 2.4.23-7.fc26 > 2.4.25-2.fc26 libgcc 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 perl-Storable 1:2.56-366.fc26 > 1:2.56-367.fc26 gmp 1:6.1.1-1.fc25 > 1:6.1.2-1.fc26 openssl-libs 1:1.1.0c-4.fc26 > 1:1.1.0c-5.fc26 nghttp2 > 1.17.0-1.fc26 httpd-tools 2.4.23-7.fc26 > 2.4.25-2.fc26 cpp 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 libev > 4.23-1.fc26 libstdc++ 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 python3-pyparsing 2.1.5-2.fc25 > 2.1.5-3.fc26 libtool-ltdl 2.4.6-12.fc26 > 2.4.6-13.fc26 python3 3.5.2-7.fc26 > 3.6.0-0.6.rc1.fc26 libuuid 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 glib2 2.51.0-1.fc26 > 2.51.0-2.fc26 python3-setuptools 28.8.0-1.fc26 > 30.4.0-2.fc26 system-python-libs 3.5.2-7.fc26 > 3.6.0-0.6.rc1.fc26 openssl 1:1.1.0c-4.fc26 > 1:1.1.0c-5.fc26 kernel-headers 4.10.0-0.rc0.git4.1.... > 4.10.0-0.rc0.git7.1.... libmount 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 python3-pip 9.0.1-1.fc26 > 9.0.1-3.fc26 p11-kit-trust 0.23.2-2.fc24 > 0.23.3-1.fc26 p11-kit 0.23.2-2.fc24 > 0.23.3-1.fc26 nss-util 3.27.0-2.fc26 > 3.28.0-2.fc26 python3-libs 3.5.2-7.fc26 > 3.6.0-0.6.rc1.fc26 libbabeltrace 1.5.0-1.fc26 > 1.5.0-2.fc26 libsemanage 2.5-8.fc26 > 2.5-9.fc26 util-linux 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 libblkid 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 libfdisk 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 rpm-libs 4.13.0-8.fc26 > 4.13.0-9.fc26 iptables-libs 1.6.0-2.fc25 > 1.6.0-3.fc26 rpm-build 4.13.0-8.fc26 > 4.13.0-9.fc26 audit-libs 2.7-1.fc26 > 2.7-2.fc26 rpm-plugin-selinux 4.13.0-8.fc26 > 4.13.0-9.fc26 libpwquality 1.3.0-6.fc25 > 1.3.0-7.fc26 libstdc++-devel 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 system-python 3.5.2-7.fc26 > 3.6.0-0.6.rc1.fc26 gnupg2 2.1.16-1.fc26 > 2.1.17-1.fc26 rpm 4.13.0-8.fc26 > 4.13.0-9.fc26 gdb-headless 7.12-29.fc26 > 7.12-31.fc26 libcap-ng 0.7.8-1.fc25 > 0.7.8-2.fc26 libxml2 2.9.3-4.fc25 > 2.9.4-1.fc26 file 5.29-1.fc26 > 5.29-2.fc26 gcc-c++ 6.2.1-2.fc26 > 6.3.1-1.fc26 libsmartcols 2.29-1.fc26 > 2.29-2.fc26 rpm-build-libs 4.13.0-8.fc26 > 4.13.0-9.fc26 file-libs 5.29-1.fc26 > 5.29-2.fc26
This caused by upgrading httpd from 2.4.23-7.fc26 to 2.4.25-2.fc26.
The new httpd was pushed into all Fedoras, Debian has patches.
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-206cd7f7fb
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-b79ea2eb1d
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-f9389a34c7

mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-b79ea2eb1d

mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-206cd7f7fb

mod_perl-2.0.10-2.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-f9389a34c7
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
mod_perl-2.0.10-2.el7 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 7 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
